Blaze & The Monster Machines: Blaze of Glory
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, DTS
['Blaze, and his driver AJ, are introduced to a world of racing Monster Machines! But when a cheating truck named Crusher uses his dirty tricks to try and win the championship race, Blaze will do everything he can to help his friends and beat Crusher to the finish line.']

Blaze & The Monster Machines: High-Speed Adventure
Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Movies
["Let's blaaaze into 4 high-speed races with the Monster Machines! Help Blaze and AJ use adhesion to stop Zeg from bouncing away and acceleration to get Darington to the Stuntmania Super Track. Plus, win a sailboat race with the right parts and wind power, and even team up with Pickle for Team Truck Challenge Day!"]

THE ORIGINALS
Science Fiction, Fantasy, Drama
['Season five begins years after the Mikaelson family absorb the Hollow’s dark energy and flee New Orleans to keep their city and Hope safe. Meanwhile, Vincent and Josh preside over the Big Easy while Hayley and Freya send Hope to the Salvatore School. The danger seems contained until a tragedy forces the siblings home, which makes the closing chapter of this family saga as emotional as ever.']
